      throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException,
             java.io.IOException,
             java.awt.FontFormatException
        Armor constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Item ID
        name - Item name
        info - Item description
        type - Armor type (0-5 value)
        material - Material of which item is made (0-4 value)
        value - Item value in gold
        armRat - Armor rating value
        bonuses - Armor bonuses to statistics
        equippEffects - List with IDs of all equip effects
        reqLevel - Level requested to wear armor
        imgName - Name of image file in icon directory for item tile
        gc - Slick game container for item tile
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        java.io.IOException
        java.awt.FontFormatException
